name: Adventure Llama (itch)
description:
Other Llamas spit at people and eat grass all day. But Pablo is different:
He explores ancient ruins built by the Inca Llamas of the past! Running madly inside the temple, Pablo will find the truth about the native Llamas of a lost time - and get lots of shiny gold artifacts! Finish levels to get Llama-moneys - then use them to unlock new worlds or get loads of cool costumes!

Features
  • Jump, run, and solve puzzles!
  • Loads of levels, plus a shiny new endless mode and a challenging time trial!
  • Anyone can play!
  • Use your Llama-Moneys to buy costumes and express yourself!
